content: DWS 225 Long-neck sander Long-neck random orbital drywall sander with variable-speed brushless motor and dust extraction (supplied with bag and extension pole) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Grinders and sanders- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster to finish – long-neck sanders can reduce project time due to the combination of speed, surface finish, and minimal rework so you can get the job done sooner Easier to use – random orbital sanders are less likely to leave surface marks, so need much less practice and re-work to achieve a perfect drywall finish Better handling – lower weight, better tool balance and 180° flexible, open sanding head give you the comfortable control needed when sanding walls, ceilings and into corners Virtually dust-free sanding – dust extraction through the sanding discs helps to prolong their lifespan, keep the air clear and minimize cleanup Minimized downtime – virtually maintenance-free brushless motor and detachable power cord for easier on-site servicing Applications Finishing drywall ceilings and walls – with the long-neck sander extension pole (included), you can often avoid using ladders or scaffolds Sanding drywall, gypsum and plasterboard filler – variable speed motor gives you better control over surface finish and removal rate Removing paint, adhesive, coatings or residue ### TECHNICAL DATA: Sanding plate diameter: 8.86 in Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 7.7 lb.
